description: This file defines a React functional component called UsersTable, which renders a table displaying a list of users with associated actions such as edit, delete, and toggle active status. It imports React and some common UI components like Badge and Button, and manages rendering based on loading state and data availability.

methods.name: UsersTable({ items, loading, onEdit, onDelete, onToggleActive })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a users table with actions for each user.

ctags.name: UsersTable
ctags.pattern: /^export default function UsersTable({ items, loading, onEdit, onDelete, onToggleActive }) {$/
